title: Serenity Salt Cave Opens Murfreesboro TN Location
text:
(MENAFN Press) Serenity Salt Cave Opens Murfreesboro TN Location Dr. Margaret Smiechowski is proud to announce the opening ofa second location for Serenity Salt Cave. 
TimeZone Converter Scientific Calculator TimeZone Converter Online PR News – 26-September-2015 – Dr. Margaret Smiechowski is proud to announce the opening ofa second location for Serenity salt cave.This new salt cave is one of Dr. Smiechowskis most unique designs yet.

It is truly a pleasure to bring the people of Murfreesboro the only Himalayan salt cave in Tennessee outside of the Nolensville location says Dr. Margaret Smiechowski North Americas foremost Salt Cave and halotherapy expert. Serenity salt caves new location brings an incredible opportunity to heal common ailments naturally in ways traditional medicine will not. People all over Tennessee need to come and experience it for themselves.

Serenity Salt Cave was built and is owned by Deana Tayler who is no stranger to Halotherapy. For many years she has brought Halotherapy to her clients. She first had Dr. Smiechowski help design the Nolensville location. After this was such a success she decided to bring a salt cave to Murfreesboro because it is a more convenient location for her clients to receive Halotherapy.

Tayler says After I spent numerous years recommending Halotherapy to my clients I realized it was time to create a salt cave right here in Nolensville. After this was such a success it was a no brainer to create a salt cave in Murfreesboro tooand with her new design I expect my clients and the lives of Murfreesboro residents to be improved by the healing properties this cave provides.

Himalayan salt provides anti-bacterial and anti-microbial properties that are extremely beneficial for numerous ailments and diseases. Forty-five minutes in the new Serenity Salt Cave has the potential to clear up acne decrease anxiety lessen the effects of C.O.P.D. and even alleviate the symptoms of if not heal upper respiratory infections.

For many years the first step to treat a common cold or even anxiety was to visit the doctor and to take a prescription medication. With the help of Dr. Smiechowski I am now bringing this viable alternative to medication to Murfreesboro. This alternative does not just treat symptoms but actually heals ailments Tyler says.

The new Serenity Salt Cave is filled with pink Himalayan salt on the floor and walls that has been imported from the Himalayan mountains. A halo generator is then used to break down salt into fine particles which is then pumped into the air. Himalayan salt is touted as the most pollutant free salt on earth and contains over 84 minerals and traces of numerous elements. One session of Halotherapy costs twenty-five dollars and is for forty-five minutes. It is opened year round and perfectly situated at 2705 Old Fort Parkway Murfreesboro TN 37128.
